mapper.select: SELECT A.ProcessID AS "ProcessID" , WorkItemID AS "WorkItemID" , UserCode AS "UserCode" , UserName AS "UserName" FROM jwf_workitem A LEFT JOIN jwf_process B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID WHERE B.FormInstID = #{formInstId} AND A.State = '528' AND A.Name <> 'preview' ORDER BY A.Created ASC

SELECT ProcessID AS "ProcessID" , WorkItemID AS "WorkItemID" , UserCode AS "UserCode" , UserName AS "UserName" FROM jwf_workitem WHERE ProcessID = #{processID} AND State = '528' AND Name <> 'preview' ORDER BY Created ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jwf_timelinemessaging (ServiceType, MessageType, ObjectID, FormSubject, Subject, Context, GotoURL, RecipientCode, RegistDate, RegisterCode ) VALUES (#{serviceType}, #{messageType}, #{objectId}, #{formSubject}, #{subject}, #{context}, #{gotoUrl}, #{recipientCode}, SYSDATE, #{registerCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT UserCode AS "UR_Code" , MultiDisplayName AS "UR_Name" FROM sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = #{userId}
